meanings.definition: To command not to do something.
meanings.sent1: Mom forbids me from eating cookies before dinner.
meanings.sent2: The sign forbids parking in this area.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat forbids the dog from entering its territory.
meanings.sent4: The storm forbids any outdoor activities with its heavy rain.
meanings.sent5: The teacher forbids talking during the test to maintain silence.

meanings.sent1: The rules forbid running in the hallways.
meanings.sent2: The lock on the gate forbids unauthorized entry.
meanings.sent3: The broken umbrella forbids any protection from the rain.
meanings.sent4: The closed road forbids any passage through the town.
meanings.sent5: The guard forbids anyone without a pass from entering the building.
